resources.string: Your will not be able to change the passcode after setting it here. Be sure to remember it as you cannot retrieve your passwords without it.
Set the passcode with which you will encrypt and decrypt your passwords:
Set the name of the stored password, which will help you identify it when retrieving it and then type the password itself.
Your password will be encrypted using your unique passcode and will then be stored under the name given. You can later decrypt it with your passcode to retrieve it.
